channel.title: spring on 香取海
channel.description: Recent content in spring on 香取海

item.title: Spring FactoryBean and ContextAware
item.description: FactoryBean 一句话就是FactoryBean用于返回其他对象实例的,而不是自身类型的实例. 例如: public class Tool { private int id; // standard constructors, getters and setters } public class ToolFactory implements FactoryBean<Tool> { private int factoryId; private

item.title: Spring Boot Notes
item.description: 一些容易忘记的spring boot知识要点. 注意,.yaml和.yml文件没任何区别. 配置 SpringBootApplication注
